speaker: Richard Corbett (PSE). –
english: Richard Corbett (PSE). – Madam President, this is not on the substance, but may I just congratulate you on putting into practice exactly what I suggested at voting time this morning, namely, to take catch-the-eye speakers at the end of a debate. I think we should do this for a short period at the end of every debate, but certainly when there is time available, as there is now. That is an excellent initiative, well done!
original: Richard Corbett (PSE). – Madam President, this is not on the substance, but may I just congratulate you on putting into practice exactly what I suggested at voting time this morning, namely, to take catch-the-eye speakers at the end of a debate. I think we should do this for a short period at the end of every debate, but certainly when there is time available, as there is now. That is an excellent initiative, well done!
agenda_item: Draft general budget for 2007, amended by the Council (all sections) – Financial Regulation applicable to the general budget of the European Communities – Draft amending budget No 6/2006 (debate)
